power.epicsorigins.mermaid/look.descript: You have a fish tail without legs

power.epicsorigins.kitsune/health.descri: Your health is increased by 1 heart
power.epicsorigins.kitsune/speed.name: Higher speed
power.epicsorigins.kitsune/fox_transform: You can turn into a fox and back to your human form

power.epicsorigins.kitsune/look.name: Kitsune`s look
power.epicsorigins.kitsune/look.descript: You have a fox tail and ears
power.epicsorigins.evolved/super_human/p: You restore full health, hunger and clear all your effects
power.epicsorigins.evolved/slime_king/pr: You shoot 5 slime balls that deal 2 damage
power.epicsorigins.evolved/slime_king/se: You jump very high and leave damage dealing area under you
power.epicsorigins.evolved/slime_king/co: You can change you color or remove it whenever you want
power.epicsorigins.evolved/angel/primary: You clear all effects from you and nearby players
power.epicsorigins.evolved/angel/seconda: You can get 8 additional hearts for a minute
power.epicsorigins.evolved/angel/undead_: You deal 2 times more damage to undead mobs
power.epicsorigins.evolved/oceanid/prima: You sing a beautiful song and mobs around you become neutral
power.epicsorigins.evolved/oceanid/secon: You can change weather to rain or clear the weather if its raining
power.epicsorigins.evolved/oceanid/long_: You can stay in air much longer
power.epicsorigins.evolved/oceanid/color: You look like a blue water spirit
power.epicsorigins.evolved/asura/primary: You set yourself on fire and become less susceptible to damage
power.epicsorigins.evolved/asura/seconda: All nearby entities will be getting fire damage for a time
power.epicsorigins.evolved/asura/burning: When you are in fire, you deal 1.5 times more damage
power.epicsorigins.evolved/asura/look.de: You have horns and tail covered in fire
power.epicsorigins.evolved/nine_tailed_k: You have grown 9 tails, so your health is increased too by 9 hearts
You are 2 times faster than regular humans
You disappear in an illusion and weaken all entities in 6 block radius
